    • Uses of AgentObserver in org.hswgt.teachingbox.core.rl.learner

      Subinterfaces of AgentObserver in org.hswgt.teachingbox.core.rl.learner 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  Learner
      Interface for all learning algorithms
      Classes in org.hswgt.teachingbox.core.rl.learner that implement AgentObserver 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ActorCriticLearner
      Actor-Critic Learning BETA STATUS TODO: ActorCritic should be updated to support all features of GradientDecentTdLearner i.e. using StepSizeCalculator and tdError vectors, ...
      class  DelayedLearner
      Learner which updates state-action pairs with a constant delay using delegation to another learner.
      class  GradientDescentExpectedSarsaLearner
      Gradient descent expected SARSA from "A Theoretical and Empirical Analysis of Expected Sarsa", Harm van Seijen, Hado van Hasselt, Shimon Whiteson and Marco Wiering Expected SARSA seems to outperform traditional SARSA as well as Q-learning
      class  GradientDescentLinearAverageStraigthenLearner
      Modified Gradient descent method similar to SARSA.
      class  GradientDescentQAverageLearner
      Gradient descent QAverageLearning.
      class  GradientDescentQLearner
      Gradient descent QLearning
      class  GradientDescentSarsaLearner
      Gradient descent SARSA
      class  GradientDescentSarsaLinearAverageLearner
      Modified Gradient descent SARSA method avoiding divergences to infinity in function approximation.
      class  GradientDescentTdLearner
      Gradient Decent Temporal Difference Learning
      class  GradientDescentVLearner
      Gradient Descent Temporal Difference Learning
      class  QDecayer<T extends QFunction>
      Abstract class for a decay mechanism which can be used to simulate an agents forgetfulness.
      class  TabularQLearner
      Ordinary Tabular Q-Learning TODO: Add eligibility traces
      class  TabularSarsaLearner
      Ordinary Tabular Sarsa-Learning TODO: Add eligibility traces
      class  TabularTdLearner
      Ordinary Tabular TD-Learning TODO: Add eligibility traces
      class  WeightDecay
      Decays all weights of a QFeatureFunction by a given factor each step resulting in an exponentionaly decay (see "Path-finding in real and simulated rats: assessing the influence of path characteristics on navigation learning" from Minija Tamosiunaite).

    • Uses of AgentObserver in org.hswgt.teachingbox.core.rl.reinforce

      Classes in org.hswgt.teachingbox.core.rl.reinforce that implement AgentObserver 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  BasicReinforceGaussianLearner
      This class provides abstact features for REINFORCE adaptation of a Gaussian kernel.
      class  EpisodicReinforceLearner
      This class adapts an arbitrary parameter based on the return per episode (REINFORCE, Williams, 1992).
      class  LocalReinforceLearner
      This class adapts an arbitrary local parameter based on the maximum Q-value in the current state (REINFORCE, Williams, 1992).
